function.name: generate_travel_narration
function.description: generate the narration of the act of traveling from the area of origin to the destination area. Follow the instructions specified above.

narration.description: The narration of the act of traveling from the area of origin to the destination area. The narration must be written in the player's first-person perspective, based on their personality, profile, and memories. If the player is traveling with followers, you should try to incorporate them in the narration according to their personalities, profiles, and memories.
